name: Messenger LiveChat
author: WidgetPack

sections.description:
Responsive and powerful live chat on your website using Facebook Messenger.

Online demo: http://demo.richplugins.com/

Feel free to try other our services https://widgetpack.com/

Plugin Features

  • It’s free!
  • Adaptive design
  • Auto-resize
  • Boost Sales
  • Live chat title
  • Live chat badge position
  • Messages, Timeline and Events Tab
  • Web or desktop apps for Android and iOS.

Support

  • Chat support https://widgetpack.com/forum

  • Email support contact@widgetpack.com
sections.installation:
1. Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside of WordPress
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.4.2

Changed plugin’s name according to Facebook’s lawyers request

1.4.1

Changed plugin’s logo according to Facebook’s lawyers request

1.4

Changed plugin’s logo according to Facebook’s lawyers request

1.3

Bugfix: warnings on the setting save

1.2

Fix incorrect tag version

1.1

  • Update readme
